column4: Reinstall in progress.  I didn't import any XP carp this time.  At least it only takes ~10 minutes to install vs XP's hour or so.
If I lose sudo rights again on all user accounts.  Is there anything I can do other than reinstall to fix it?  I'm worried that this could happen long after the install.
You can check your "sudoers" file, and make sure that the users you want are in the "admin" group.
Booting into "recovery mode" from GRUB will give you root access.
